page.title: 16PRINTER MANAGER
page.content: My father's occupation is printing. He works for Bowaters which is a firm on the Faverdale industrial estate.He works on the Pre-print departmant known as Bow-print.He is a printing machine manager on a machine named the Cobdan Chadwick which is one of the most advanced printing machines in Britain.This process of printing is an extremely new advancement in the container industry.Before Pre-print days all cartons were printed after the paper was converted into the cardboard which was used for making the customers boxes.This form of printing is known as post-corrugater printing.The pre-corrugater printing means that the layer of paper used to make up the outside of a container is printed before being made into corrugated board on the corrugater machine.{(Continued P.17)}
